personalInfo.name: Prabin Shah
personalInfo.summary: I am a dedicated Software Engineer with over 2 years of experience. I build strong, secure, and scalable applications to solve real-world problems. Using modern tech, I help businesses improve their digital presence and run more efficiently.
personalInfo.aboutSummary: Passionate about crafting efficient and scalable software solutions. With a strong foundation in Java and modern web technologies, I specialize in building backend systems that drive business growth. I thrive on solving complex challenges and am committed to continuous learning and delivering high-quality code.

services.title: Backend Development
services.description: Secure and scalable Java applications with Spring Boot, microservices architecture, and API development.

services.title: Frontend Development
services.description: Responsive web interfaces using React.js and modern frontend technologies.

services.title: Database Management
services.description: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB optimization, and maintenance.

services.title: Cloud Solutions
services.description: AWS infrastructure setup, EC2, S3, Lambda, CloudFormation, and cloud-native application development.

details: Enhanced expertise in Java and the Spring framework.
Developed a full backend API for an Employee Management System.
Designed and implemented a full backend REST APIs for a book rental system using Spring Boot, including: User authentication, book listings, and rental processing.
Operated within the Scrum framework, contributing to: Sprint planning, execution, and reviews.
Addressed and resolved bugs, ensuring system stability and performance.
Collaborated with the frontend team to ensure seamless integration and optimal user experience.
Developed REST APIs for web application
Resolved bugs, enhancing system stability and performance.
Collaborated with the frontend team for seamless integration and user experience.

projects.name: Expense Tracker
projects.description: Developed a backend-centric Expense Tracker application using Java, Spring Boot, and MySQL, designed to help users manage their personal finances.
features: Dashboard API for summarizing financial data
Filter API for custom data queries (by date, type, etc.)
Notifications API for real-time financial alerts
Incorporated best practices like JPA auditing, global exception handling, and internationalization (i18n).

projects.name: HimalayanBites
features: Implemented secure user login and registration using JWT-based token authentication.
Developed RESTful endpoints to manage cart items, place orders, and handle order history for users.
Built a dynamic admin dashboard for restaurant owners to manage menu items, track orders, and update restaurant details.

projects.name: Pharmanuman
projects.description: Web-based Pharmacy management system using Java, Spring Boot, Thymeleaf, and MySQL.
features: Pharmacies can place order for medicine from stockists.

projects.name: Retail Billing Software
projects.description: Efficient billing and inventory management solution for retail businesses.

projects.name: Trading Platform
projects.description: Full-stack trading application for real-time asset management.

projects.name: SaaS POS Application
projects.description: Scalable Point of Sale application designed for multi-tenant SaaS environments.
